CustomField.inlineHelpText: All escalated matters must include the key, relevant documentation you mention in this document. Check for and be sure to attach copies of relevant documents when you submit the matter to your coach, including:
CustomField.label: NC/NS - Relevant Documentation

value.fullName: Signed acknowledgements of relevant policies, and demographics.
value.label: Signed acknowledgements of relevant policies, and demographics.

value.fullName: Any documentation of the employee’s expected workdays/hours provided to the employee, including an offer letter, orientation paperwork, emails, etc.
value.label: Any documentation of the employee’s expected workdays/hours provided to the employee, including an offer letter, orientation paperwork, emails, etc.

value.fullName: The client’s attendance policy or other policy that explains its rules for NC/NS and reporting an absence.
value.label: The client’s attendance policy or other policy that explains its rules for NC/NS and reporting an absence.

value.fullName: All other relevant emails, documents, and notes of communications with the employee.
value.label: All other relevant emails, documents, and notes of communications with the employee.

value.fullName: The client’s handbook – identify specific pages of relevant policies
value.label: The client’s handbook – identify specific pages of relevant policies
